item.title: Let's Derive - Expectation Maximization
item.description: I’ve gotten so tired of reading other people’s descriptions of Expectation Maximization that don’t seem to help me understand it better so I’ve decided to write my own. Hopefully, this makes it so that I never have to read anyone else’s description again. Reader Assumptions Since I’m writing this for myself, I’m going to assume a lot of knowledge. This is intended to be a prelude to a follow-up post in which I’d like to derive the Baum-Welch algorithm for learning Hidden Markov Model (HMM) parameters from data.
